name: Ocean Breeze Motel

reviews.text: This was the best motel we have stayed in for quite some time. Park right in front of your door- no lugging your bags through lobbies and up stairs. Modern conveniences (microwave, refrigerator) in a cozy, clean setting. Very quiet even though it is right off Hwy 101 (convenient!) Our room had two sleeping areas separated by a wall and door - privacy for those traveling together without having to pay for 2 rooms. The staff was extremely courteous and helpful.
reviews.title: Perfect Place to Stay

reviews.text: This motel is extremely clean, comfortable, and quiet. It has been nicely remodeled and updated. The grounds are beautiful, with a picnic table, small path, and enclosed play area for dogs. The owners were friendly and welcoming. We would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Great find!

reviews.text: Like an old school motor court. Parking is right in front of your door. My room was spotless and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The price here is much better than at comparable motels right in Florence. This property is south of town a mile or so. It's a great deal for a pleasant stay along this part of the Oregon coast.
reviews.title: Delightful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After riding our motorcycles 8 hrs...it was a pleasure to arrive and find such a well kept property...clean room with an inviting bed to sleep in. Newly remodeled the room was large with a microwave and fridge as well as the flat screen tv ...all nice touches. The shower was excellent with plenty of hot water and pressure. All this was way more then we expected from a "motel". I will definitely be staying here again in the future. (AND the young lady that checked us in was smiling, helpful and new my name upon checkin. Please this place is a gem....lets all take care of it so we can enjoy what it has to offer for years to come.
reviews.title: Above Motel Standards!!!!!!!

reviews.text: Extremely friendly, clean, fire pit, horseshoes, and best coffee in town! A wonderful place to stay with lots of character and charm! The managers were great in directing us to places to visit, the one level, back your car in right to the door reminds me of traveling as a child with my family. Even though we don't have a dog, it seemed to be dog friendly with a designated dog area. Highly recommended!
reviews.title: True Oregon Coast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners have done such a nice job with this Motel. The rooms were very clean, updated with nice touches nice flat panel TV's. They actually provided pet linens which was such a nice touch. The location is very convienent to downtown Florence and the price was right. Thanks Again!
reviews.title: Great Place and Doggy Friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A decent wifi, a good bed,nice shower, very clean room, great manager. It has a coffee maker refrigerator, an microwave oven. It was also vey quiet. Highly recommended. The room was recently remodeled. The water as with every hotel I have stayed it inOregon is very hard. That is about all I would change.
reviews.title: Very nice room

description: Newly refurbished, charming and meticulously clean rooms each with microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker, cable TV and free Wi-Fi. We offer several dog friendly rooms and we have a new dog park on the grounds. Lots of areas to relax outdoors and picnic tables for family gatherings. Fresh coffee located in the office as well as in the rooms is available each morning.
